short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Performs a SmartWhois query on the current URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to launch SmartWhois and perform a Whois query on the current URL. SmartWhois is a useful network information utility that allows you to look up all the available information about an IP address, hostname or domain, including country, state or province, city, name of the network provider, administrator and technical support contact information.
